message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I know it's a valuable piece, and I believe this price reflects its worth.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500.  It's a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,000 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
